DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study to supplied the diagnostic and treatment criteria of the nonunion of the long tubular bone after treatment of Intramedallery nailing
DOC.brief_title: The Study of the Nonunion of Long Tubular Bone
DOC.criteria: 1. The patient who had the nonunion of long tubular bone 2. The patient who was the age of 14 ~ 65 years old. 3. The patient who complete the followup conditions. 4. The patient who has independent behavior ability. 5. The patient who volunteered for signed informed consent 1. Infectious nonunion of the long turubar bone 2. Pathological fracture. 3. The immune system disease. 4. Cancer
